name: Car Highway Rush Racing
description:
Do you love endless racing games through heavy traffic? If yes then fasten your seat belt to experience extreme racing simulator on the highway by driving in car, jeep, truck and big bus through highway traffic. Race in car to get real cockpit view and overtake endless traffic

Features:
• Easy to learn and drive
• 3D realistic graphics view
• Endless game mode with mission challenge
• Different locations and cars to choose
• Simulator-like controls
• Excellent detailed cars
• Realistic car driving
